paper_abstract: In this paper, a general technique for automatically defining multilayer Cellular Neural Networks to perform Chebyshev optimal piecewise linear approximations of nonlinear functions is proposed. First, a novel CNN cell output function is proposed. Its main goal is to control input and output dynamic ranges. Afterwards, this 2-layer CNN is further programmed to achieve generic piecewise Chevyshev polynomials that approximate a nonlinear function.
paper_title: Nonlinear mappings with Cellular Neural Networks
